thread.title: Our family legacy is because of KSL Swamy: Darshan
thread.title_full: Our family legacy is because of KSL Swamy: Darshan - The Times of India

author: Sunayana Suresh
title: Our family legacy is because of KSL Swamy: Darshan
text:
Darshan, son of Thoogudeepa Srinivas, recounted his family's connection with KSL Swamy. He said, "He was the person who launched my father through the film Thoogudeepa, which became synonymous with my father. Our family legacy, hence, is because of him. He was very close to our family and my father would look up to him as an elder brother. He has also advised me on my career whenever we met and was a well-wisher to me."
Some memorable KSL Swamy films: Thoogudeepa Malaya Marutha Banashankari Makkala Bhagya Maagiya Kanasu Jimmy Gallu Harakeya Kuri Sri Krishna Rukmini Satyabhama Kulla Agent 000 Huli Hejje Mithileya Seetheyaru Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
